revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Marco Papavero|Marco Papavero]] ([[User talk:Marco Papavero|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:imported>M86|imported>M86]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZBT |model=WE1326 |est_release_date=2016 |fcc_date=05/23/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2AC47-ZBT-WE1326 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GE16EWXD-12H |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, Micro SD card slot |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, (57600,8,N,1),, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7603EN;MEDIATEK, MT7603EN, 1715-BMJL, CTPC3Y30; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14;Ralink SDK; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=78:A3:51 |oui_eth=78:A3:51 }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/213.html Product page]{{•}}[https://www.alibaba.com/product-detail/zbt-we1326-MT7621-dual-band-4G_60643378529.html Alibaba page]
"ZBT-WE1326 V02" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
A Family Models Letter at the FCC claims that the following model names all use the same circuit and RF module. :ZBT-WE1326, ZBT-WE1026-5G,ZBT-WE3526, ZBT-WE826-Q, ZBT-APG521, :ZBT-APG721, ZBT-WE4626, ZBT-APG621, ZBT-WE4726, ZBT-WD223
===Hardware=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz Dual Core *Flash: SPI 16MB (max 32MB)/NAND (no populated) *RAM: DDR3 512MB (max 512MB)| HW:V5 DDR3 256MB
===Product features=== :♦ Support 802.11abgn/ac network protocol (2.4/5 GHz) :: max transmission rate could be 1200Mbps (300+867 Mbps) :♦ 5x 10/100/1000Mbps (Auto MDI/MDIX), support 802.3u protocol, :♦ 1x USB 2.0 ports, 1x Micro SD Card Slot, 1x SIM Card Slot :♦ Supports 3G/4G (an option, w/o Mini PCIe 3G/4G module), :♦ 802.11ac dual band (an option, w/o Mini PCIe 5GHz module) :♦ The HW version V5 has only 256MB memory
'''Note''': There are NO HEATSINKS installed by default, :PCB photo with heatsinks below is a MODDED state. {{see also|ZBT WG3526|ZBT WG2626}}
==Images== <gallery> File:WE1326-exterior-1.jpg|Exterior File:WE1326-exterior-2.jpg|Other side File:4G-LTE-ZBT-1326-wireless-router-2.png|Ports and antennas File:WE1326-Ant-wiring.jpg|Antennas location and connection File:WE1326-PCB-top.jpg|PCB top File:WE1326-PCB-bottom.jpg|PCB bottom File:WE1326-Connectors.jpg|Front panel File:4G-LTE-ZBT-1326-wireless-router.png|Main board </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
